game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the ruins.
game.description: You've received a map leading to an artifact of great power. Locate and retrieve it from the forgotten ruins.
game.reward: 100 experience points and a magical relic

task.description: Follow the map to the location marked with an 'X'.
Carefully search the ruins for any clues to the artifact's location.
